    Class Description
    BilateralF.Parameters  
    BilateralFilterScalar
    Scalar version, applicable to all image types.
    BilateralFilterScalarSeparable
    Scalar version, applicable to all image types.
    BilateralFilterVector
    Vector version, for RGB images only (accepts ColorProcessor only).
    BilateralFilterVectorSeparable
    Separable vector version, for RGB images only (accepts ColorProcessor only).
    KuwaharaF.Parameters  
    KuwaharaFilterScalar
    Scalar version.
    KuwaharaFilterVector
    Vector version (applicable to ColorProcessor only).

    Scalar version.
    NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector
    Vector version.
    PeronaMalikF.Parameters  
    PeronaMalikFilterScalar
    Scalar version, without gradient array.
    PeronaMalikFilterVector
    Vector simplified version with greatly reduced memory requirements.
    TschumperleDericheF.Constants  
    TschumperleDericheF.Parameters  
    TschumperleDericheFilter
    This class implements the Anisotropic Diffusion filter proposed by David Tschumperle in D.
